title: Can't open launcher.
body:
As title says, I can't open up the launcher/patcher. I've tried the 
> Step 1 :
> 
>     Go to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects"
> 
>     Delete "lol_launcher"
> 
>     Start your client as admin and wait 30s-1mn
> 
> Step 2 : (if step 1 not working)
> 
>     Delete:
> 
>     everything inside "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads"
> 
>     "lol_air_client" and "lol_air_client_config_xxx" inside "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects"
> 
>     everything inside "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions"

From my google searches. Tried  Un and Re install the game, but still no luck. When I do try to open it, I get the "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working."

replies.body: It looks like your OS is blocking the patcher form launching and scanning files.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access for good.  This should get you back in, but let me know if you have any issues!
